chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
pt: Equality.sort nat_eqType
round: nat
lg: Log
next_data: data

Goal:
pt \in pts -> PhaseOne d round next_data lg -> exists ps : PState, pt_state d (round, ps) lg pt

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
data = seq nid : Set
PhaseOne = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) => (exists sent : seq nid, cn_PhaseOneSend d round next_data l sent) \/ (exists recvd : seq (nid * bool), cn_PhaseOneReceive d round next_data l recvd) : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> Prop Arguments PhaseOne _ _%nat_scope
pt_state = fun (d : dstatelet) (p : PStateT) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => loc pt d = st :-> p \+ log :-> l : dstatelet -> PStateT -> Log -> nid -> Prop
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
nid = nat : Set
Inductive PState : Set := PInit : PState | PGotRequest : data -> PState | PRespondedYes : data -> PState | PRespondedNo : data -> PState | PCommitted : data -> PState | PAborted : data -> PState
Notation seq := list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
PhaseTwoCommit_req_round : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), tag m = commit_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg -> exists ps : PState, pt_state d (round, ps) lg pt
PhaseTwoAbort_req_round : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), tag m = abort_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg -> exists ps : PState, pt_state d (round, ps) lg pt
PhaseOne_round_cn : forall (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseOne d round next_data lg -> exists cs : CState, cn_state d (round, cs) lg
abort_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt \/ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.abort_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
prep_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = prep_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseOne d round next_data lg
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet pt : nat_eqType round : nat lg : Log next_data : data |- Type] ?P : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet pt : nat_eqType round : nat lg : Log next_data : data |- ?A -> Type]
Inv = fun d : dstatelet => exists (round : nat) (l : Log), [\/ EverythingInit d round l, exists next_data : data, PhaseOne d round next_data l | exists next_data : data, PhaseTwo d round next_data l] : dstatelet -> Prop
cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentAbort next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data l pt else exists b : bool, pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
commit_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.commit_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
prep_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) lg pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & msg_spec cn pt Exports.prep_req (round :: next_data) (dsoup d)]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet pt : nat_eqType round : nat lg : Log next_data : data |- Type]
prep_yes_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = prep_yes -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn prep_yes [:: round] (dsoup d)]
prep_no_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = prep_no -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn prep_no [:: round] (dsoup d)]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet pt : nat_eqType round : nat lg : Log next_data : data |- Type]
cn_PhaseOneReceive = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)) => let rps := [seq i.1 | i <- recvd] in [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd) l, uniq rps, {subset rps <= pts}, forall (pt : nat_eqType) (b : bool_eqType), pt \in pts -> (pt, b) \in recvd -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> pt \notin rps -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq (nid * bool) -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseOneReceive _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitAckCommit next_data recvd) l, uniq recvd, {subset recvd <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in recvd then pt_PhaseTwoResponded d round next_data l true pt else pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentCommit next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data l pt else pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l true pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitAckAbort next_data recvd) l, uniq recvd, {subset recvd <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in recvd then pt_PhaseTwoResponded d round next_data l false pt else pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
PhaseTwoAbort = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log) => (exists sent : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts d round next_data lg sent) \/ (exists recvd : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts d round next_data lg recvd) : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> Prop Arguments PhaseTwoAbort _ _%nat_scope
PhaseTwoCommit = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log) => (exists sent : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits d round next_data lg sent) \/ (exists recvd : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits d round next_data lg recvd) : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> Prop Arguments PhaseTwoCommit _ _%nat_scope
cn_PhaseOneSend = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentPrep next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt else pt_Init d round l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseOneSend _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
abort_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = abort_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.abort_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
commit_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = commit_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.commit_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
PhaseTwo = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) => [\/ exists sent : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits d round next_data l sent, exists sent : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts d round next_data l sent, exists recvd : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits d round next_data l recvd | exists recvd : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts d round next_data l recvd] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> Prop Arguments PhaseTwo _ _%nat_scope
pn_safe_in : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : data), pn_safe others Hnin prec this to d m -> this \in nodes cn pts others /\ to \in nodes cn pts others
EverythingInit = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (l : Log) => cn_state d (round, CInit) l /\ (forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)]) : dstatelet -> nat -> Log -> Prop Arguments EverythingInit _ _%nat_scope
getStP : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> PStateT
pn_safe_coh : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : data), pn_safe others Hnin prec this to d m -> TPCCoh cn pts others d
getStP_K : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), n \in pts -> loc n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStP Hnin C pf = m
locCn : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> valid (loc n d) /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (loc n d))
cohStP : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in pts -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (loc n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = PStateT
pt_PhaseOne = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & msg_spec cn pt Exports.prep_req (round :: next_data) (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PGotRequest next_data) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.prep_yes [:: round] (dsoup d)] | [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.prep_no [:: round] (dsoup d)]] : dstatelet ->...-> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseOne _ _%nat_scope
pt_PhaseTwoAbort = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt \/ pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.abort_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PAborted next_data) (rcons l (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)] | [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons l (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.abort_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseTwoAbort _ _%nat_scope
getStL : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> Log
this_not_pts : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall this : nat_eqType, this \in pts -> (this == cn) = false
pn_step : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop), bool -> forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), pn_safe others Hnin prec this to d msg -> option (union_map_classPCM heapUMC)
pt_PhaseOneResponded = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (committed : bool) (pt : nid) => [/\ no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d), no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & if committed then pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt else pt_state d (round, PRespondedNo next_data) l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> bool -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseOneResponded _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%bool_scope
pn_gen_send_trans : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall t : ttag, t \in [:: prep_yes; prep_no; commit_ack; abort_ack] -> (data -> PState) -> bool -> Transitions.send_trans (TPCCoh cn pts others)
pt_PhaseTwoCommit = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.commit_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PCommitted next_data) (rcons l (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)] | [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons l (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.commit_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_PhaseTwoCommit _ _%nat_scope
TwoPhaseProtocol.TPCProtocol.pn_gen_send_trans_obligation_1 : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall t : ttag, t \in [:: prep_yes; prep_no; commit_ack; abort_ack] -> forall (ps : data -> PState) (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn cn pts this to -> send_prep_resp_prec ps s m -> cohMsg cn pts {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1
